endsWith

public static boolean endsWith(String s1,
                               String suffix)
Returns true if string ends with suffix. Example if s1 is "this is a string" and suffix is "ring" the return value will be true.

Parameters:
s1 - a string
suffix - a string
Returns:
true if s1 ends in suffix

Create a string, the reverse of string using StringBuilder

Parameters:

Returns:
a copy of string reversed

reverse_2

public static String reverse_2(String string)
Create a string, the reverse of string An array of char type of same size of string is instantiated. In a for loop the string characters are assigned to the array in reverse order. The array is used to create a string which is then returned. This string will be the reverse of the actual parameter string.

Parameters:
string - the string to be reversed
Returns:
a copy of string reversed

reverse_3

public static String reverse_3(String string)
Reverses a string using the StringBuffer class

Parameters:
string - the string to be reversed
Returns:
a copy of string reversed

subString

public static String subString(String s1,
                               int indexStart,
                               int indexEnd)
Create substring of s1 from indexStart to indexEnd excluding indexEnd That is: range is [indexStart, indexEnd) Example String "Hello ICTSkills" indexStart = 2; indexEnd = 8; substring is "llo IC"

Parameters:
s1 - a string
indexStart - of s1 becomes zeroth index of substring
indexEnd - of s1 determines end of substring
Returns:
the substring

toUpper

public static String toUpper(String s1)
Create string the uppercase version of s1

Parameters:
s1 - a string
Returns:
copy of s1 all in upper case
